document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Genus
Platypleura Amyot
&
Audinet-Serville, 1843

Tettigonia kaempferi Fabricius, 1794 : 23
.

Platypleura kaempferi : Chou et al. , 1997 : 168
; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 153 ; Lee, 2008 : 3 ; Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 : 37 .
Distribution. Most provinces of China (including Hainan and Taiwan ), Japan , Korea , Malaysia and Vietnam (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2008 ).

Remarks. This species was recorded from Hainan by Chou et al. ( 1997 ). The record of this species from USSR by Chou et al. ( 1997 ) could not be confirmed, and is not supported by other literature (e.g. Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 ; Lee, 2008 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a).

Platypleura hilpa Walker, 1850 : 6
; Chou et al ., 1997 : 170 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 156 ; Lee, 2008 : 3 .

Material examined. Hainan: 3 ♂♂ 3 ♀♀, Mt. Qixianling, 150 m ,
14 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 6 ♂♂, Xinglong, 30 m ,
19 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Mt. Bawangling, 150 m ,
26 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 5 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Jianfeng, 170 m ,
30 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 5 ♂♂ 1 ♀, Bangxi, 80 m ,
1 .vi. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
2 ♀♀, Danzhou, 135 m ,
1 .vi. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 4 ♂♂, Leiming, 60 m ,
3 .vi. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂ 3 ♀♀, Dingan, 20 m ,
3 .vi. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 3 ♂♂ 2 ♀♀, Mt. Tongguling, 20 m ,
26 .viii. 2010
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Maoyang, 325 m , light trap,
5 .viii. 2009
, coll. Xiaobin (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan, Hunan, Guangdong, Guangxi, Fujian, Zhejiang, Yunnan and Taiwan ), Vietnam (Chou et al ., 1997 ; Lee, 2008 ).

Platypleura assamensis Atkinson, 1884 : 212
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 171 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 .

Material examined. Hainan: 1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling, 950 m , light trap,
20 .vii. 2009
, coll. Meng Rui (NWAFU). Distribution. China (Hainan and Yunnan), India (Chou et al. , 1997 ).
Remarks. This species is newly recorded from Hainan.

Pycna coelestia Distant, 1904 a: 335
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 175 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
27 .ii. 1982
, coll. Pan Ruilin (SYSU); 2 ♀♀, Mt. Jianfengling,
5 .iv. 1992
, coll. Wang Min (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan, Guangdong, Sichuan and Guangxi) (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ).

Gaeana hainanensis Chou & Yao, 1985 : 128
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 137 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 : 6 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
2 ♀♀, Mt. Limushan, 650 m ,
19 .iv. 2008
, coll. Zheng Jianwu & Men Qiulei (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂, Mt. Wuzhishan, 700 m ,
17 .v. 2007
, coll. Duan Yani & Li Yankai (NWAFU). Distribution. China (Hainan), Vietnam (Pham & Yang, 2009 ).

Gaeana consors Atkinson, 1884 : 221
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 137 ; Sanborn, Phillips & Sites, 2007 : 26 .
Distribution. China (Hainan, Sichuan, Yunnan and Guangdong), Thailand , India and Myanmar (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Sanborn et al. , 2007 ).
Remarks. This species was recorded from Hainan by Chou et al. ( 1997 ).

Gaeana cheni Chou & Yao, 1985 : 129
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 138 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 40 ; Sanborn, Phillips & Sites, 2007 : 26 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 : 6 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
12 .iv. 1982
, coll. Hu Huihong (SYSU). Distribution. China (Hainan, Guangdong and Yunnan), Vietnam and Thailand (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 ; Sanborn et al. , 2007 ).
